1.0.name: wordpress/kt-cleanpress
1.0.description:
Kt-cleanpress is a plugin designed to clean and optimize WordPress. It will give you the following options:

  1. Clean Posts: which will let you remove all posts marked as Trash / Pending / Draft with all their related contents from the database, and then it will defragment it.

  2. Clean Pages: will do the same things described in Clean Posts, but it will process the pages.

  3. Clean Comments: will do the same things described in Clean Posts, but it will process the Spam / Unapproved / Trash Comments.

  4. Clean Post Revisions: Whenever a post is edited and saved WordPress automatically creates a backup to which one can revert. This option will remove all posts backups.

  5. Clean Auto Draft: This is a left over from the process of creating a new WordPress page or post and not saving it as a draft of publishing it.

  6. Clean Other Left Overs: Will remove navigation menus that are created but not saved, and all the
